project.name: E-commerce Platform
project.description: Comprehensive data model for an enterprise e-commerce platform

entities.name: User
entities.description: Registered users of the platform including customers, administrators, and vendors

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user

attributes.name: Email
attributes.description: User's email address, used for login and notifications

attributes.name: Password
attributes.description: Hashed password for user authentication

attributes.name: FirstName
attributes.description: User's first name

attributes.name: LastName
attributes.description: User's last name

attributes.name: Phone
attributes.description: User's contact phone number

attributes.name: UserTypeId
attributes.description: Reference to the user type (Customer, Admin, Vendor, etc.)

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the user account is active

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the user account was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated

entities.name: UserType
entities.description: Types of users in the system (Customer, Admin, Vendor, etc.)

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user type

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the user type (Customer, Admin, Vendor, etc.)

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description of the user type and its permissions

entities.name: Address
entities.description: Shipping and billing addresses for users

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the address

attributes.name: UserId
attributes.description: Reference to the user who owns this address

attributes.name: AddressLine1
attributes.description: Primary address line (street address)

attributes.name: AddressLine2
attributes.description: Secondary address line (apt, suite, etc.)

attributes.name: City
attributes.description: City name

attributes.name: State
attributes.description: State or province

attributes.name: PostalCode
attributes.description: ZIP or postal code

attributes.name: Country
attributes.description: Country name

attributes.name: AddressType
attributes.description: Type of address (Shipping, Billing, Both)

attributes.name: IsDefault
attributes.description: Indicates if this is the default address for the user

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the address was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the address was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the category

attributes.name: ParentCategoryId
attributes.description: Reference to the parent category (null for top-level categories)

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the category

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description of the category

attributes.name: Slug
attributes.description: URL-friendly version of the category name

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the category is active and visible on the site

attributes.name: DisplayOrder
attributes.description: Order in which the category is displayed

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the category was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the category was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the brand

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the brand

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description of the brand

attributes.name: Logo
attributes.description: URL to the brand's logo image

attributes.name: Website
attributes.description: URL to the brand's website

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the brand is active and visible on the site

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the brand was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the brand was last updated

entities.name: Product
entities.description: Products available for purchase in the e-commerce platform

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the product

attributes.name: SKU
attributes.description: Stock Keeping Unit - unique product identifier

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the product

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Detailed description of the product

attributes.name: ShortDescription
attributes.description: Brief summary of the product

attributes.name: Price
attributes.description: Regular selling price of the product

attributes.name: SalePrice
attributes.description: Discounted price of the product if on sale

attributes.name: Cost
attributes.description: Cost of the product to the business

attributes.name: CategoryId
attributes.description: Reference to the product's primary category

attributes.name: BrandId
attributes.description: Reference to the product's brand

attributes.name: Weight
attributes.description: Weight of the product in specified unit (e.g., kg)

attributes.name: Dimensions
attributes.description: Dimensions of the product (length x width x height)

attributes.name: StockQuantity
attributes.description: Current stock quantity of the product

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the product is active and visible on the site

attributes.name: IsFeatured
attributes.description: Indicates if the product is featured on the site

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the product was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the product was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the product image

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the product this image belongs to

attributes.name: URL
attributes.description: URL to the image file

attributes.name: AltText
attributes.description: Alternative text for the image for accessibility

attributes.name: DisplayOrder
attributes.description: Order in which the image is displayed

attributes.name: IsPrimary
attributes.description: Indicates if this is the primary image for the product

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the image was created

entities.name: ProductVariant
entities.description: Variants of products (e.g., different sizes, colors)

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the product variant

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the parent product

attributes.name: SKU
attributes.description: Stock Keeping Unit - unique variant identifier

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the variant (e.g., 'Small - Red')

attributes.name: Price
attributes.description: Price of this specific variant (if different from parent product)

attributes.name: StockQuantity
attributes.description: Current stock quantity of this variant

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the variant is active and available for purchase

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the variant was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the variant was last updated

entities.name: Order
entities.description: Customer orders placed on the platform

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the order

attributes.name: UserId
attributes.description: Reference to the user who placed the order

attributes.name: OrderNumber
attributes.description: Human-readable order number for customer reference

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current status of the order (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled)

attributes.name: TotalAmount
attributes.description: Total amount of the order including tax and shipping

attributes.name: Subtotal
attributes.description: Subtotal amount of the order before tax and shipping

attributes.name: Tax
attributes.description: Tax amount applied to the order

attributes.name: ShippingCost
attributes.description: Shipping cost for the order

attributes.name: DiscountAmount
attributes.description: Discount amount applied to the order

attributes.name: ShippingAddressId
attributes.description: Reference to the shipping address for this order

attributes.name: BillingAddressId
attributes.description: Reference to the billing address for this order

attributes.name: PaymentMethod
attributes.description: Payment method used for the order

attributes.name: Notes
attributes.description: Additional notes or instructions for the order

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the order was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the order was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the order item

attributes.name: OrderId
attributes.description: Reference to the order this item belongs to

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the product ordered

attributes.name: ProductVariantId
attributes.description: Reference to the product variant ordered, if applicable

attributes.name: Quantity
attributes.description: Quantity of the product ordered

attributes.name: UnitPrice
attributes.description: Price per unit at the time of purchase

attributes.name: Subtotal
attributes.description: Total price for this item (quantity * unit price)

attributes.name: DiscountAmount
attributes.description: Discount amount applied to this item

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Status of this specific item (Pending, Shipped, Delivered, Returned, Cancelled)

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the order item was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the order item was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the payment

attributes.name: OrderId
attributes.description: Reference to the order this payment is for

attributes.name: Amount
attributes.description: Payment amount

attributes.name: PaymentMethod
attributes.description: Method of payment (Credit Card, PayPal, etc.)

attributes.name: TransactionId
attributes.description: External transaction ID from payment processor

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Status of the payment (Pending, Completed, Failed, Refunded)

attributes.name: PaymentDate
attributes.description: Date and time when the payment was processed

attributes.name: Notes
attributes.description: Additional notes about the payment

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the payment record was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the payment record was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the shipment

attributes.name: OrderId
attributes.description: Reference to the order this shipment is for

attributes.name: TrackingNumber
attributes.description: Tracking number for the shipment

attributes.name: Carrier
attributes.description: Shipping carrier (UPS, FedEx, etc.)

attributes.name: ShippingMethod
attributes.description: Shipping method (Standard, Express, etc.)

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Status of the shipment (Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered)

attributes.name: ShippedDate
attributes.description: Date and time when the shipment was sent

attributes.name: EstimatedDeliveryDate
attributes.description: Estimated date and time of delivery

attributes.name: DeliveredDate
attributes.description: Actual date and time of delivery

attributes.name: Notes
attributes.description: Additional notes about the shipment

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the shipment record was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the shipment record was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the shipment item

attributes.name: ShipmentId
attributes.description: Reference to the shipment this item belongs to

attributes.name: OrderItemId
attributes.description: Reference to the order item being shipped

attributes.name: Quantity
attributes.description: Quantity of the item being shipped

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Status of this specific shipment item

attributes.name: Notes
attributes.description: Additional notes about the shipment item

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the shipment item was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the shipment item was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the cart

attributes.name: UserId
attributes.description: Reference to the user who owns the cart (null for guest carts)

attributes.name: SessionId
attributes.description: Session identifier for guest carts

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Status of the cart (Active, Abandoned, Converted)

attributes.name: Subtotal
attributes.description: Subtotal amount of items in the cart

attributes.name: TotalAmount
attributes.description: Total amount including tax and shipping

attributes.name: CouponCode
attributes.description: Coupon code applied to the cart

attributes.name: DiscountAmount
attributes.description: Discount amount applied to the cart

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the cart was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the cart was last updated

attributes.name: ExpiresAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the cart expires

entities.name: CartItem
entities.description: Individual items within a shopping cart

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the cart item

attributes.name: CartId
attributes.description: Reference to the cart this item belongs to

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the product in the cart

attributes.name: ProductVariantId
attributes.description: Reference to the product variant in the cart, if applicable

attributes.name: Quantity
attributes.description: Quantity of the product in the cart

attributes.name: UnitPrice
attributes.description: Price per unit at the time of adding to cart

attributes.name: Subtotal
attributes.description: Total price for this item (quantity * unit price)

attributes.name: DiscountAmount
attributes.description: Discount amount applied to this item

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the cart item was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the cart item was last updated

entities.name: Wishlist
entities.description: User wishlists for saving products for future purchase

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the wishlist

attributes.name: UserId
attributes.description: Reference to the user who owns the wishlist

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the wishlist

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description of the wishlist

attributes.name: IsPublic
attributes.description: Indicates if the wishlist is public and shareable

attributes.name: ShareableLink
attributes.description: Unique shareable link for the wishlist

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the wishlist was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the wishlist was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the wishlist item

attributes.name: WishlistId
attributes.description: Reference to the wishlist this item belongs to

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the product in the wishlist

attributes.name: ProductVariantId
attributes.description: Reference to the product variant in the wishlist, if applicable

attributes.name: Notes
attributes.description: User notes about this wishlist item

attributes.name: Priority
attributes.description: User-defined priority for this item

attributes.name: AddedPrice
attributes.description: Price of the product when it was added to the wishlist

attributes.name: CurrentPrice
attributes.description: Current price of the product (updated periodically)

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the wishlist item was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the wishlist item was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the review

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the product being reviewed

attributes.name: UserId
attributes.description: Reference to the user who wrote the review

attributes.name: OrderItemId
attributes.description: Reference to the order item that was purchased and reviewed

attributes.name: Rating
attributes.description: Rating given to the product (typically 1-5)

attributes.name: Title
attributes.description: Title of the review

attributes.name: Content
attributes.description: Content of the review

attributes.name: IsVerifiedPurchase
attributes.description: Indicates if the review is from a verified purchase

attributes.name: IsApproved
attributes.description: Indicates if the review has been approved by moderators

attributes.name: HelpfulVotes
attributes.description: Number of users who found this review helpful

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the review was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the review was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the coupon

attributes.name: Code
attributes.description: Coupon code that users enter at checkout

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description of the coupon

attributes.name: DiscountType
attributes.description: Type of discount (Percentage, Fixed Amount, Free Shipping)

attributes.name: DiscountValue
attributes.description: Value of the discount (percentage or amount)

attributes.name: MinOrderAmount
attributes.description: Minimum order amount required to use the coupon

attributes.name: MaxDiscountAmount
attributes.description: Maximum discount amount that can be applied

attributes.name: StartDate
attributes.description: Date when the coupon becomes valid

attributes.name: EndDate
attributes.description: Date when the coupon expires

attributes.name: UsageLimit
attributes.description: Maximum number of times the coupon can be used

attributes.name: UsageCount
attributes.description: Number of times the coupon has been used

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the coupon is currently active

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the coupon was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the coupon was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the inventory record

attributes.name: ProductId
attributes.description: Reference to the product (null if variant-specific)

attributes.name: ProductVariantId
attributes.description: Reference to the product variant (null if product-level)

attributes.name: WarehouseId
attributes.description: Identifier for the warehouse location

attributes.name: QuantityAvailable
attributes.description: Current available quantity in stock

attributes.name: QuantityReserved
attributes.description: Quantity reserved for pending orders

attributes.name: ReorderPoint
attributes.description: Quantity at which to reorder stock

attributes.name: ReorderQuantity
attributes.description: Quantity to order when reordering

attributes.name: LastStockUpdate
attributes.description: Timestamp of the last stock update

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the inventory record was last updated

entities.name: Tax
entities.description: Tax rates for different regions and product categories

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the tax record

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the tax (e.g., 'VAT', 'Sales Tax')

attributes.name: Rate
attributes.description: Tax rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.07 for 7%)

attributes.name: Country
attributes.description: Country this tax applies to

attributes.name: State
attributes.description: State or province this tax applies to

attributes.name: ZipCode
attributes.description: ZIP or postal code this tax applies to

attributes.name: CategoryId
attributes.description: Product category this tax applies to (null if applies to all)

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the tax is currently active

attributes.name: StartDate
attributes.description: Date when the tax becomes effective

attributes.name: EndDate
attributes.description: Date when the tax expires

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the tax record was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the tax record was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the promotion

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Name of the promotion

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Description of the promotion

attributes.name: StartDate
attributes.description: Date when the promotion starts

attributes.name: EndDate
attributes.description: Date when the promotion ends

attributes.name: IsActive
attributes.description: Indicates if the promotion is currently active

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the promotion was created

attributes.name: UpdatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the promotion was last updated

attributes.name: Id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the notification

attributes.name: UserId
attributes.description: Reference to the user receiving the notification

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: Type of notification (Order, System, Promotion, etc.)

attributes.name: Title
attributes.description: Title of the notification

attributes.name: Message
attributes.description: Content of the notification

attributes.name: IsRead
attributes.description: Indicates if the notification has been read

attributes.name: RelatedEntityType
attributes.description: Type of entity this notification relates to (Order, Product, etc.)

attributes.name: RelatedEntityId
attributes.description: ID of the entity this notification relates to

attributes.name: CreatedAt
attributes.description: Timestamp when the notification was created

relationships.name: AddressToOrder_Shipping
relationships.description: Relationship between Address and Order for shipping

relationships.name: AddressToOrder_Billing
relationships.description: Relationship between Address and Order for billing
